title: New Patient Outcome Assessed in Psoriasis Biologic Trial - Medscape

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: Mean WHO-5 scores improved from 53.7 to 70.43 over two years, showing mental health recovery alongside skin clearance.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Use adaptive trial designs to incorporate patient-reported outcomes as primary endpoints early in development.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸŸ¡ NOTABLE]**: Growing regulatory push for PROs in clinical trials; FDA expects them within 12 months of submission.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias may affect the validity of PRO results, potentially overestimating benefits.
